citances.sentence: 25 The primary judge heard the non-claimant application over five days, and delivered reasons and made orders on 18 December 2008 making the declaration sought by the Land Council, that is, there is no native title in the Land: Worimi Local Aboriginal Land Council v Minister for Lands for the State of New South Wales (No 2) [2008] FCA 1929 (the primary judgment).
